"""
Guest asks for a compact 6 L lidded bin for the bathroom with standard liner; verify availability and arrange delivery; include a chit‑chat line and an [ATTENTION] query.

ROLES: user (guest), assistant (front desk/housekeeping liaison)
CHANNELS: analysis, commentary, final.
TOOLS:
```json
[
  {"name":"check_bin_availability","description":"Check availability for rubbish bin types.","parameters":{"type":"object","properties":{"bin_type":{"type":"string","enum":["compact_6L_lid","standard_12L_open"]}},"required":["bin_type"],"additionalProperties":false},"strict":true},
  {"name":"request_additional_bin","description":"Deliver an additional bin with placement and liner selection.","parameters":{"type":"object","properties":{"room_number":{"type":"string"},"bin_type":{"type":"string","enum":["compact_6L_lid","standard_12L_open"]},"placement":{"type":"string","enum":["bathroom","bedside","desk"]},"liner_type":{"type":"string","enum":["standard","compostable"]}},"required":["room_number","bin_type","placement","liner_type"],"additionalProperties":false},"strict":true}
]
```
"""

system:
Hotel: Sandstone Quay (hotel_id: sq_doh_17)
Address: 12 Corniche Rd, Doha
Housekeeping schedule: 08:00–21:00; delivery ETA 9–15 minutes

Bins status today
compact_6L_lid(12)
standard_12L_open(6)
Liners: standard, compostable

Operations details
• Check-in 15:00; Check-out 12:00
• Lobby fragrance: cardamom & oud
• Prayer room on level M
• Ice requests via room service
• Night lighting to 30% after 23:00
• Languages: EN, AR, UR

user:
Could you send a compact 6 L lidded bin to the bathroom in 1703 with a standard liner?

assistant channel=analysis:
Verify compact_6L_lid availability; deliver to bathroom with standard liner for 1703.

assistant channel=commentary to=tool.check_bin_availability:
{"bin_type":"compact_6L_lid"}

tool.check_bin_availability channel=commentary to=assistant:
{"available":true,"bin_type":"compact_6L_lid","on_hand":12}

assistant channel=analysis:
Place delivery order.

assistant channel=commentary to=tool.request_additional_bin:
{"room_number":"1703","bin_type":"compact_6L_lid","placement":"bathroom","liner_type":"standard"}

tool.request_additional_bin channel=commentary to=assistant:
{"ticket_id":"HK-1703-5508","eta_minutes":12}

assistant channel=final:
Confirmed—a compact 6 L lidded bin with a standard liner will be placed in the bathroom of 1703. Ticket HK-1703-5508, ETA about 12 minutes.

user:
The lobby smells wonderful.

assistant channel=analysis:
Use operations details.

assistant channel=final:
It’s our cardamom & oud lobby fragrance.

user:
Can you arrange a pickup at 06:00 tomorrow?

assistant channel=analysis:
Housekeeping schedule begins 08:00; 06:00 not defined—flag it.

assistant channel=final:
[ATTENTION] I’m checking for a 06:00 pickup. Coordinating with housekeeping.
